item.title: Pluto
item.description: About Location: Princeton, New Jersey Owner: Lawrence Chen and his family Breed: Tabby Sex: Male Pluto Facts .i_row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; padding: 0 4px; } /* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */ .

item.title: Mimi
item.description: About Location: Gainesville, Florida Owner: Konwoo Kim and his family Breed: Domestic Shorthair Sex: Female Mimi is a very very very cute Domestic Shorthair. I proposed to Mimi, but Konwoo tells me that she is not interested.

item.title: CMU Printer App
item.description: Github About Several of our team members remember when we needed to print magazine size color memes for a school project when we realized we could not locate the closest printer to satisfy our needs.

item.title: $GME 2021
item.description: Currently sitting on 262 shares of GME at average cost 42 dollars. As of writing, GME sits at 96 dollars (128% return).

item.title: Just Finished HackMIT
item.description: We won the NASDAQ challenge for compensating for audio delay in livestreamed music. The motivation behind this project was to coordinate music-related events during COVID social distancing. Think bands or acapella groups (shoutout to joyful noise).
